clip.quote: I decided I was not going to be the Lexus driving REALTOR and embraced my true identity.
clip.why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional image of a REALTOR and emphasizes authenticity.
clip.suggested_hook: Why being yourself is your best marketing strategy.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Why being yourself is your best marketing strategy!",
    "SETUP": "Meet Dani Hampton, a REALTOR who ditched the Lexus stereotype to embrace authenticity. Here's why it matters.",
    "INSIGHT": "Dani shares, 'I decided I was not going to be the Lexus driving REALTOR and embraced my true identity.' By being genuine, she built stronger client relationships and a more fulfilling career.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Authenticity isn't just refreshing; it's effective. Let your true self shine and watch your business thrive.",
    "CTA": "Ready to embrace authenticity? Share your story in the comments or tag a friend who needs to hear this!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Ditch the stereotype, embrace authenticity. Your true self is your best asset! #RealEstate",
  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstate",
    "#Authenticity",
    "#MarketingStrategy",
    "#BeYourself",
    "#RealTalk"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```

clip.quote: It's not about the client being difficult; it's about me not setting the right expectations.
clip.why_clipworthy: Encourages personal responsibility and proactive client management.
clip.suggested_hook: Transform your client relationships with this mindset shift.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Transform your client relationships with this mindset shift!",
    "SETUP": "Dani Hampton shares a game-changing perspective on client management. Discover why setting the right expectations is crucial.",
    "INSIGHT": "Dani says, 'It's not about the client being difficult; it's about me not setting the right expectations.' By taking responsibility, you can proactively manage client relationships and prevent misunderstandings.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "This mindset shift empowers you to create smoother transactions and happier clients. Start by clearly communicating expectations from the outset.",
    "CTA": "Think about your last client interaction. How could setting better expectations have changed the outcome? Share your thoughts!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Shift your mindset: It's not the client, it's the expectations. #RealEstateTips",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateMindset", "#ClientManagement", "#PersonalGrowth", "#RealEstateAdvice", "#MindsetShift"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```
